short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to add insights to your Wikipedia experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our tool helps users understand the additions to an article, and the relationship between page views and edits. Our extension highlights additions to the page between a specified date and the present and renders a graph of page views and edits during different time periods.
